### IPromptPlusConfig.MinimumPrefixLength property
</br>


#### Number minimum of chars to accept autocomplete.Default value is 3. Valid range is 1–255; values outside the range are coerced to the nearest boundary.

```csharp
public byte MinimumPrefixLength { get; set; }
```
